title: please riot pleeaassee
body: sigh, ok riot games, i may sound like a total idiot and a stubborn fool for this but... i am 7 rp short off a mystery skin so i was just wondering if you guys were generous enough to you know, donate 7 rp for the poor :DD i mean i do sound like a greedy bastard like dem master yi's every single game but maybe just prety please?

replies.body:
You can submit a support ticket and ask them, but there are a few things you need to know.

1. They are not in any way obliged to give it you.
2. For under 50 RP USUALLY they will give it to you if you submit to them something like a poem or a drawing or the like (something you created that's league related basically)
3. This is a one time deal. Once you get the RP once, you'll never get it again, regardless if it's 49 or 1 RP.

So there you go! That's the best way to go about it, just don't expect it to be guaranteed, because it really isn't and you'll have to put in a bit of work to get them something you've made :) Good luck!
